about_the_game:
Explore an unfamiliar place filled with powerful enemies, advanced technology and scientific advancements in Eletta, an action game about a girl finding herself in a position where her actions could save the world.

While trying to escape captivity, she discovers why she was kidnapped and decides to stop it from happening to anyone else using only the tools she finds along the way.

BECOME A HERO

People may not always be what they seem, famous heroes could be the source of evil while evil people may just be misguided heroes. Uncover the secrets of this world, give people the benefit of the doubt, help who you can help and stop who needs to be stopped.

IMPROVISED COMBAT

Forced into a situation, not being prepared Eletta uses anything she can find to defend herself and move forward. Using a wrench as a weapon, a makeshift slingshot and nails as projectiles and her ingenuity to make traps out of anything she finds to overcome all odds. Use anything at your disposal to gain an edge.

EXPLORE AND FIGHT BACK

  • Uncover heartfelt stories behind every pretense and experience varied, engaging combat
  • Discover hidden pathways to reach new places and hidden treasures to help you on your way
  • Fight mighty bosses trying everything to stop you
  • Find secret rooms that will change how you view everyone around you

name: Eletta

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8250U (4 * 1800) or equivalent; AMD Phenom II X4 965 (4 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce MX 150 ( 2048 MB); Radeon R7 260X (2048 MB)
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Explore an unfamiliar place filled with powerful enemies, advanced technology and scientific advancements in Eletta, an action game about a young girl looking for a way back home.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Korean
*languages with full audio support
